item.title: #en @ 1477104280062468096
item.description: Sending deepest empathy to all impacted by terrible fires in the Boulder/Louisville area. Our office was spared, but many buildings around us are destroyed. Sharing a SAR image through clouds of smoke @ 9:41am MST today. Image is in our open data catalog for all to access. https://t.co/OC1opRXLmc

item.title: #en @ 1477066300656607234
item.description:
I should add - this was a challenging year - but it has illustrated the immense power we have to hold govt to account. From open data on schools; to tracking the epidemic; to those who advocated for govt to do better, here and in media - you've all made a difference.
Thank you.
